content: Another PR about the valuation of Laurent series, towards proving that Laurent series are the adic completion of rational functions. @Scott Carnahan had some comments, and @Andrew Yang did a great review of the previous ones... :ping_pong:
I also discussed some of these results with @Antoine Chambert-Loir

Thanks @Johan Commelin ! That was fast :racecar: I noticed you hit on bors merge
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14418#pullrequestreview-2184958996
and thus your two suggestions (about a commented this and a misspelled indices) got lost. Do you want me to re-open a PR to modify them?

Concerning the erw, the problem is often encountered when lean has to pick up the R and K from a Valued instance. I cannot really see why, but will try to dig a bit to understand if I figure out a solution.

Whoops :oops: :see_no_evil:
I hit the wrong button... I didn't mean to merge it already...

If you could make a small followup PR, that would be great
Thanks :sweat_smile:
